intro: Orostachys vyschinii, commonly known as the stonecress, is a flowering plant native to Central Asia. It is a low-growing perennial that forms dense mats of succulent, fleshy leaves. The plant produces small, greenish-yellow flowers during the summer months. It thrives in arid and semi-arid environments, often found in rocky or sandy soils. Orostachys vyschinii is valued for its ornamental appeal and resilience in harsh climates.
